example_en: Love is the most important thing.
She gave me a warm hug.
He kissed her on the cheek.
I'll invite you to the party.
Let me introduce you to my friend.
He's an acquaintance, not a friend.
A dog is a loyal companion.
Send my greetings to your family.
She cried when she was sad.
Good friends listen to each other.
Can I give you some advice?
I have good memories of school.
I visit my grandparents every weekend.
He was my mentor at work.
I met my classmate at the library.
She's very generous with her time.
Don't be selfish with your friends.
She was shy as a child.
She's always cheerful in the morning.
There's a spirit of fellowship here.
Everyone needs a sense of belonging.
I feel closeness to my family.
Distance makes the heart grow fonder.
